publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1387 Patrick Harvie: Opposition to Heathrow Expansion—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Government to take into consideration its own commitments to reducing carbon emissions and to promoting sustainable transport when formulating its response to the Department for Transport consultation, Adding Capacity at Heathrow Airport, and, given such commitments, urges ministers through this consultation to oppose the proposals for the construction of a third runway at Heathrow. Supported by: Elaine Smith*
S3M-1387 Opposition to Heathrow Expansion (lodged on 20 February 2008) Gil Paterson*

S3M-1387 Patrick Harvie: Opposition to Heathrow Expansion—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Government to take into consideration its own commitments to reducing carbon emissions and to promoting sustainable transport when formulating its response to the Department for Transport consultation, Adding Capacity at Heathrow Airport, and, given such commitments, urges ministers through this consultation to oppose the proposals for the construction of a third runway at Heathrow. Supported by: Elaine Smith, Gil Paterson
S3M-1387 Opposition to Heathrow Expansion (lodged on 20 February 2008) Robin Harper* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
